mage hina okkoma wathure,eyala enawa kiwwa welawata kalin awith widiyo shut eka karagena hene wadata hitiya ayagen linda gana wisthara aragena api enna kalin gihilla thawath mokakdo widiyo shut ekakata yanna oone kiyala.man podi ekage hitha godak siduna eda nam moko balaporoththu godak wathure giya nisa.hari kamak na muna daganna bari unata ape linda hari tiwi eke pennanawa ne kiyala hitiya ee gollo kiwwa dawasata balanna.eeth kohenda appa mata echchara wasanawak pennanawa kiwwa dawase ude idan ra wenakan karant thibbe na gedarata.onna ohoma thama mage tiwi ekata muna dime sihinaya bidune.

minihekuta yamak ugannana ekath lesi pahasu deyak nemeyi.samahara de puna puna ohuta kiyanna oone.eth man kawadawath tharaha gihin ohuta buranna, payin gahanna yanne naha.dethun wathaka kendiri gamin ohuta nawatha ee deya therum kirimata uthsaha gannawa.samahara welawata mage aahara ganima ta yamata ohu ida denne naha.

watup ha diri dimana wadikara ganima, paya 40 ka sewa sathiyak sthapitha kirima, nishchitha sewa kalayak nathi wima nisa ahimi wu athikala ha diri dimana nawatha labaganima saha dumriya sewaya adhikariyak yatathata path kirimata wirodhaya palakirima sandaha dumriya departhamenthuwe sewa kihipayakata ayath kamkaruwan 12,000 k dedina sanketha wada warjanayaka niratha wethi.
